name: cartoobly
description:
Brave the 'dangers' of cartoobly's cute world, and see if you can find the hidden pixel-alien in every level!

 

Everything that has a face can kill you. No matter how adorable it is, if it's moving and has eyes, it's a threat! (that is, except for plants)

Featuring 30 levels, 16 biomes, a wide variety of enemies and a bunch of powerups & weapons.

Average playtime ⁓ 2 - 3 hours

   

────────────────────────────────────

This game has absolutely no plot or storyline. Have fun!

────────────────────────────────────

Contact Info If you need to contact me for any reason, you can do so at: dsoutar812@gmail.com Help

When running cartoobly, Windows Defender SmartScreen may prevent the game from starting. If so, all you need to do is click on More info and then press Run anyway.
